C

calibrate() - Method in class irobots.vision.CompassSensor
Calibrate the compass sensor in order that it is aligned with the boundaries of the field so that two boundary lines go from north to south and two from west to east.
camera - Static variable in class irobots.Global
The camera sensor at the front of the robot.
Camera - Class in irobots.vision
Abstracts the access to the NXTCam and provides utility functions to read the objects detected by the camera.
Camera() - Constructor for class irobots.vision.Camera
 
camToScreenX(double) - Static method in class irobots.vision.Camera
converts the x coordinate from the camera in order to display rectangles from the camera on the NXT screen.
camToScreenY(double) - Static method in class irobots.vision.Camera
converts the y coordinate from the camera in order to display rectangles from the camera on the NXT screen.
checkChecksum(String) - Method in class irobots.comm.CommunicationManager
Checks if the checksum of the given message is valid.
chipDetected() - Method in class irobots.vision.ColorSensor
This method returns true if the color sensor has detected a colored chip.
color - Static variable in class irobots.Global
The robots color sensor.
ColorSensor - Class in irobots.vision
Abstracts the access to the NXT color sensor and provides utility functions to read information about detected chips or border lines.
ColorSensor() - Constructor for class irobots.vision.ColorSensor
 
comm - Static variable in class irobots.Global
The communication manager handles the communication between the robots.
CommunicationManager - Class in irobots.comm
The CommunicationManager provides functions which can be used to send messages to other robots.
CommunicationManager() - Constructor for class irobots.comm.CommunicationManager
Creates a new CommunicationManager instance and starts the message receiving thread.
compass - Static variable in class irobots.Global
The robots compass sensor.
CompassSensor - Class in irobots.vision
This class provides access to the compass sensor which is calibrated in a way that 0Â° are on the positive x-axis.
CompassSensor() - Constructor for class irobots.vision.CompassSensor
